metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Updating New Teams
metadata.email_text_original:
I believe that refers to activation. We reinstalled a PC for a client just a few
weeks ago. They had purchased the machine with windows 8 and upgraded to 10. The
disk died a few weeks back and when we went to apply the win 10 upgrade it
refused. According to MS support the ability to activate upgraded machines was
switched off in sept. 
As to upgrading from win7/8 to win10. While MS said they switched it off in
2016, it has continued to work without issue since then. I’m not sure if it has
only been working on the major manufacturers like Dell, HP, Lenovo o has also
worked with others as well. 
Ian Murphy 
[cid:image001.png@01DA1747.22320030] 
ian@integra-xp.com

Sus datos no son cedidos a terceros ajenos a Integra Experience S.L. En todo

El contenido de este correo electrónico y de sus anexos es estrictamente

difundir, almacenar o copiar su contenido.
